item.title: Download cacert.pem File
item.description:
When working with SSL you need to provide Revolution with a certificate file so it can verify that the host is who it says it is. You can download a cert file here:

http://curl.haxx.se/docs/caextract.html

You include this file in your application files and set the sslcertificates property to the path to the file.
